review_data.title: Enjoyable Meal in Good Setting
review_data.content: In Zurich for the night and was looking for a nice quick dinner near our hotel. We stepped in here and immediately knew we wanted to stay. It felt like a local crowd enjoying Sunday dinner. Food, service, and atmosphere were all very good.
